column3: ej,alouf101,M,hallt901,Throwing at batter after warning ej,ruetk001,P,hallt901,Throwing at batter after warning $Pitcher Rueter and Expos manager Alou ejected by HP umpire automatically for throwing at batter after warning
ej,alouf101,M,wendh901,Arguing delay from fans throwing things Expos mamager Felipe Alou ejected by 3B umpire Harry Wendelstedt for arguing about a game delay due to fans throwing items on the field

$Henry Rodriguez took his time leaving the plate as he admired his home run

ej,cangj001,P,laynj901,Bench-clearing brawl ej,collt801,M,laynj901,Bench-clearing brawl ej,darwd001,P,laynj901,Bench-clearing brawl ej,may-d001,P,laynj901,Bench-clearing brawl ej,aloum001,P,laynj901,Bench-clearing brawl ej,judej001,P,laynj901,Bench-clearing brawl ej,rodrh001,P,laynj901,Bench-clearing brawl $Henry Rodriguez charged the mound and both benches emptied; in the 10-minute brawl, Astros manager Terry Collins was hit on the face with a batting helmet and needed four stitches to close the gash; Collins, Darwin, Rodriguez, John Cangelosi, Derrick May, Moises Alou and Jeff Juden ejected by HP umpire Jerry Layne
